# ⚠️ DEPRECATED

These JavaScript files are **no longer used** and kept for reference only.

The active codebase is in `src/` (TypeScript).

## Migration Status

All functionality has been migrated to TypeScript:
- `lib/claude.js` → `src/lib/claude.ts`
- `lib/google-drive.js` → `src/lib/google-drive.ts`
- `lib/twilio.js` → `src/lib/twilio.ts`
- `lib/db.js` → `src/lib/db.ts`
- `lib/banktofile.js` → `src/lib/banktofile.ts`

**Do not edit these files.** Edit the TypeScript versions in `src/lib/` instead.

These files can be safely deleted once confirmed no external scripts reference them.
